name: HERBERT
description:
Created and submitted for the Unreal 2020 Game Jam

Description

Help clumsy penguin Herbert find campfires to melt the ice. He'd be much obliged and he's rather handsome under there!

Submission Name:

HERBERT

Team Name:

WEMEN (Consists of 2 people)

Team Details:

Tom Standing: tstanding99@gmail.com

Patric Fryer: patric.webmail@gmail.com

Controls:

W / Space: Jump

A / D: Left / Right

Esc: Pause

Resources:

Wind effect  by: Tabletop Audio (Dark Forest)

https://tabletopaudio.com/darkforest_sp.html

All other content was created within the timeframe of the Unreal 2020 Game Jam by the WEMEN team.
